metadata.title: CVE-2022-0670 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in Openstack manilla owning a Ceph File system "share",which enables the owner to read/write any manilla share or entire filesystem. The vulnerability is due to a bug in the "volumes" plugin in CephManager. This allows an attacker to compromise Confidentiality andIntegrity of a file system. Fixed in RHCS 5.2 and Ceph 17.2.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0670` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
